name: RN apps: Load users in long Add Members list

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Load users in long Add Members list - RN apps
––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
On a server with enough users to fill several pages of scrolling (such as mysql.test or community-release):
  1. Tap the channel header
  2. Tap "Add Members"
  3. Swipe up repeatedly (10+ times) to load more users in list
inline.expectedResult: • Users should continue to load, without skipping any (should be obvious if it's skipping big chunks of users; also can compare to Add Members list on browser)
